features: FREE BONUS Frog Bath Toys: This set contains 8 colourful cups with animals, 4 geometric shape blocks, a castle, a rattling rabbit, and a free swimming frog. Stack, nest, sort, build, count, knock down, rattle shaker, shape sorter, water play, beach play and other creative play. A great interactive indoor and outdoor toy set that keeps babies 6 months to 3 years old busy and entertained.

DEVELOPMENTAL SENSORY TOYS FOR EARLY LEARNER: Stackable cups is come with suitable size, which is perfect for little hand, and high contrast color with various printed animals. It's a great interactive toys to improve baby 9-12 18-24 months counting skills, relative size & shapes, animals and colors recongition, and teach baby how things fit together. Ideal first birthday gifts for baby boy girl 1 year old.

ENCOURAGE SITTING AND STANDING UP: This infant toys can be built up to 23 inch. It challenges toddler's ability to sit and stand up and stack cups higher and higher in order of size. Babies will have hours fun of stacking up and demolish them and giggling every time he/she do it. This help learn cause and effect, develop hand-eye coordination, imaginative thinking, problem-solving skills and fine motor skills.

CONVENTIENT STORAGE TO STORE AND CARRY EASILY: Use the castle cup to build a cool sandcastle at the beach, or be the base of high stacking castle. Turn its upside down, it is also a shape sorting toys and a storage box. Help baby develop a good habit of getting toys organized after playing. 6 inch tall is easy to take for outdoor play or travel.

SAFE MATERIAL & 100% GUARANTEE: Made of high-quality ABS, durable, non-toxic, BPA-free and smooth surface. No sharp edges and light cups design for children to stack, nesting, sorting, and knock down safely. Valued gifts for baby 6 to12-18 months. Any problems, please contact us. Our team is always standing by to help.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Animal castle stacking cups and shape sorter toddler baby learning toys 6 to 12-18 months, water toys sand toys for 1 2 year old boy girl, 15 PCS PLUS This stacking toys come with 8 colorful cups and 4 geometric shape blocks have animals embossed on the cups' base, a rattling rabbit, and a swimming frog. Turn the castle upside down, it becomes a shape sorting toys and a storage box. Babies can shake the rattle to make sound, stack and nest cups in proper sizing order, build a castle, identify colors, animals, differentiate sizes, count, push down, turn cups over and hide things underneath, and match shapes!

The best first birthday gifts for toddler boy girl 1-3 for the following reasons: Open-Ended, Creative Play: - Rattle Shaker: Shake the cute rabbit to make sounds to attract your little one's attention. - Stacking Cups: Stack higher and higher one by one in order of size. - Nesting Cups: Turn the cups upside-down, sorting them from biggest to smallest, then turn them over and nest them inside each other. - Shape Sorter Toys. - Bath Toys: Each cup has holes in the bottom for water play fun. Fill them up and watch the water trickle out of the bottom! Also, play with the frog, seeing it swimming. - Beach Toys: Play in the sandpit or on the beach for pouring, scooping, and molding fun. - Little Flowerpot. Exceptional Educative Play Toy: It helps develop baby's curiosity and introduce him to the first stages of problem-solving, on top of helping build strong fine and gross motor skills, and hand-eye coordination. Help baby develop a good habit of getting toys organized after playing. 6 inches tall is easy to take for outdoor play or travel. Children Safety： These stacking toys baby cups are made of high-quality plastic materials with smooth surfaces and no burrs. And cups are very light, which stacking and knocking are safe for children. Every time the child stack high of cup and pushes it down, the baby will giggle each time. Stack the small cups when not in use to reduce the volume and facilitate storage. It is a necessary Montessori baby toy for the baby's growth. It can cultivate children's cognitive ability and train their hands-on ability, and it can also promote parent-child relationships during play. The best gift that will not disappoint you and your child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun!
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t expecting much from this toy, but it’s great! We stack the cups and my almost 2 year old has so much fun and laughs so hard knocking it over. She can stack them now too and she’s so proud. On the bottom there are blocks with different shapes and she is so proud when she puts them in the right hole. My husband and I have fun stacking this toy too. There are animals on every cup so we are also reaching the baby animals and colors. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for your little ones
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 1.5yo. She and her two high sisters (3&5) love playing with it too. She loves stacking the little cups and knocking them over. The perfect toy for your little one
